title: RIOT, PLEASE. NA has been lagging for TWO WEEKS.
body:
2 weeks of having horrible lag spikes every single match with no exception. Almost every time an enemy appears in my vision range, there's a lag spike, but they're mostly random. They happen any day, at any time, on EVERY match. I'm from South America and my ISP is Telef√≥nica.

I'm not the only one with this issue. Lots of people I've met on my matches have had lag too. They're mostly from Canada and Asia, but I don't see a pattern. In my last match, everyone was lagging. EVERYONE. I don't understand how this issue hasn't been addressed by anybody at Riot. Please do something, it's impossible to play like this.

replies.body: Your physical distance from where you are in relation to the NA server is very far, so there may be some connection issues regardless of any troubleshooting done.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up the strength of your PC, but keep in mind that this strength cannot exceed that physical distance present.  Good luck!

I play just fine all the time, with ~200 ping but it's perfectly playable. But only these 2 weeks have I been getting these huge lag spikes. And as I said, I'm not the only one with the same issue, I've seen people from Canada suffering from this too
I don't know but if they don't  pull their head out of their asses soon I'll go back to Dota and give them my money instead.
